name: Strength
effect: Creatures controlled by enchanted player have +1 Power

name: Flight
effect: At the beginning of combat on the enchanted player's turn, up to one creature controlled by the enchanted player gains flying.

name: Shade
effect: At the beginning of enchanted player's turn, they may remove a creature card in their graveyard from the game. If they do, they create a 0/1 Wisp creature token.

name: Deathgrip
effect: At the beginning of enchanted player's turn, they discard a card.

name: Shield
effect: Creatures controlled by enchanted player have +1 Defense.

name: Drain
effect: At the beginning of enchanted player's turn, they gain 1 life and their opponents each lose 1 life.

name: Agony
effect: At the end of enchanted player's turn, their opponents each lose 1 life.

name: Firebreath
effect: Whenever a creature controlled by the enchanted player attacks, that creature deals 1 damage to target creature.

name: Blight
effect: At the start of enchanted player's turn, deal 1 damage to each creature they control.

name: Lethargy
effect: Creatures controlled by enchanted player have -1 Power.

name: Shrink
effect: At the beginning of combat on the enchanted player's turn, up to one creature gets -1 Power and unblockable.

name: Invert
effect: Sacrifice Invert: You and target opponent exchange life totals. This ability may only be activated by the enchanted player.

name: Age
effect: Sacrifice Age: You and target opponent's life both become 1. This ability may only be activated by the enchanted player.

name: Alacrity
effect: Sacrifice Alacrity: You and Target opponent's life both become 5. This ability may only be activated by the enchanted player.

name: Haste
effect: At the beginning of combat on the enchanted player's turn, up to one creature controlled by the enchanted player gains haste.
